translated: The Chapter on Elements
The Illustrator
The Illustrator of the Terms Included and Not Included in the Fourth Way
The thoughts that are included in the truth of origin …

original: maggasaccena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena🔽saṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā
analyzed: magga saccena ye dhammā khandha saṅgahena saṅgahitāḥ āyatana saṅgahena saṅgahitāḥ dhātu saṅgahena  saṅgahitā tehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandha saṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatana saṅgahena saṅgahitā
translated: The thoughts that are included in the truth of the path are included in the aggregate of mental formations, in the sense-field of mental objects, in the element of mental objects.

original: dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā, te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitā?
analyzed: dhātu saṅgahena saṅgahitā te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihā āyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitā
translated: The thoughts that are included in the aggregate of mental formations, in the sense-field of mental objects, in the element of mental objects, are included in how many aggregates, how many sense-fields, how many elements?

original: Te dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.
analyzed: te dhammā ekena khandhena ekena āyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā
translated: They are included in one aggregate, in one sense-field, in one element.
The thoughts that are included in the femininity faculty …
The thoughts that are included in the masculinity faculty …
